description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Ayame-San, a Japanese romance of the 23rd year of Meiji, 1890. By A. M. Illustrated from photographs by W. K. Burton, etc. [The prefatory letter signed: J. M. By James Murdoch.]" Author: M., A. Contributor: M., J. Contributor: MURDOCH, James - M.A Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012634.m.4." Page: 24 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1892 Publisher: Walter Scott Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002298000 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
